articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: China tries to make nice with Big Tech as economic challenges mount - CNN
articles.description: China is trying once again to lift the spirits of its huge tech industry after a bruising regulatory offensive that has weakened some of its biggest businesses at a time of stalling economic growth.
